content:
In order to become a Silver Elite Member at Ripped Fitness, members must lift a total of $20{,}000$ $\text{kg}$ or more in a single workout.  David intends to accomplish this by only using the bench press and the squat machine. He will lift $100$ $\text{kg}$ each bench press repetition and $200$ $\text{kg}$ each squat repetition.

**Write an *inequality* that represents the number of repetitions on the bench press $(B)$ and the squat machine $(S)$ that David needs to complete to become a Silver Elite Member.**

[[☃ expression 1]]

**Graph the constraint equation with $S$ on the horizontal axis and $B$ on the vertical axis.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**If David completes $95$ repetitions on the bench press $(B)$, which of the following numbers of squat machine repetitions $(S)$ can he complete to become a Silver Elite Member?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]
